Posts.Content: Okay so you are not brave... but it still takes courage to deal with it all! I've no personal experience of chemo - though have sat with a friend whilst she was having it. My wife's (Heather) cancers involved surgery and radioactive iodine therapy. Have you checked out chemotherapy Topic Thread? You can look there and even send a PM - personal message by clicking on name of someone posting and clicking PM. I have put your name in my PC diary - will pop up as a prayer reminder for Friday 13th! There are some positive thoughts ref. anxiety on 'Prayer Support' thread. Best wishes John
Posts.Title: Advice

Posts.Content: You are having a tough time! Sending you best wishes and my prayers! My posting under Forum Topics - Spirituality Section - PRAYER SUPPORT - story of the donkey seems appropriate for you to read! God Bless You John
Posts.Title: sorry to be such a misery
